scripts.fix: docker compose rm activitypub nginx -sf && docker compose build activitypub nginx
scripts.test: yarn dev && docker compose exec activitypub yarn test:all
scripts.test:unit: c8 --src src --all --reporter text --reporter cobertura mocha -r tsx './src/**/*.unit.test.ts'
scripts.test:integration: c8 --src src --all --reporter text --reporter cobertura mocha -r tsx './src/**/*.integration.test.ts'
scripts.test:code: c8 --src src --all --reporter text --reporter cobertura mocha -r tsx './src/**/*.test.ts'
